data.title: Maine Community College System
data.meta_description: System office staff can be reached at the numbers listed below. To reach a staff member by email, unless otherwise indicated, add @mccs.me.edu to the first initial and last name of the person. For example: asmith@mccs.me.edu.
data.text:
Staff Directory

System office staff can be reached at the numbers listed below. To reach a staff member by email, unless otherwise indicated, add @mccs.me.edu to the first initial and last name of the person. For example: asmith@mccs.me.edu.

Office of the President

Dave Daigler, President, 207-629-4017

Bonnie Brown, Executive Assistant to the President and Clerk of the Board of Trustees, 207-629-4017

Academic Affairs

Janet Sortor, Vice President and Chief Academic Officer, 207-629-4007
